body.p: allows you to define Master Files at project level. These master files are automatically used by to determine the context for operations such as validation, content completion, refactoring, or searches for XML, XSD, XSL, WSDL, and RNG modules. maintains the hierarchy of the master files, helping you to determine the editing context.

To watch our video demonstrations about the Master Files support for XML documents, XSL documents, and WSDL documents, see Working with Modular XML Files, Master Files Support, and Working with Modular WSDL Files.
